snippet.title: GTA The Ballad of Gay Tony - Full Game Walkthrough in 4K
snippet.description:
Grand Theft Auto: The Ballad of Gay Tony Full Movie Walkthrough / Guide video with all 26 missions (100% score) and Random Characters - 4K Ultra HD 60 fps [Played on PC]

Rockstar Games Walkthrough Videos Playlist: https://bit.ly/2RP61Bl

► YOUTUBE: https://www.youtube.com/GTASeriesVideos
► INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/GTASeriesNews
► FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/GTASeriesNews
► TWITTER: https://twitter.com/GTASeries
► DISCORD: https://discord.gg/GTASeries

This video shows how to complete all mission objectives in a single run, although the 100% completion is cumulative and can be achieved with multiple playthroughs.

0:00 Intro & Mission #1 - I Luv LC
14:16 Mission #2 - Chinese Takeout
25:17 Mission #3 - Momma's Boy
32:36 Mission #4 - Corner Kids
45:24 Mission #5 - Clocking Off
52:20 Random Encounter - Daisy
58:21 Mission #6 - Practice Swing
1:09:15 Random Encounter - Arnaud #1
1:12:23 Random Encounter - Arnaud #2
1:17:13 Mission #7 - Blog This!...
1:21:44 Mission #8 - Bang Bang
1:31:22 Random Encounter - Margot #1
1:34:29 Random Encounter - Margot #2
1:37:28 Mission #9 - Boulevard Baby
1:47:01 Mission #10 - Frosting on the Cake
1:58:21 Mission #11 - Kibbutz Number One
2:07:17 Mission #12 - Sexy Time
2:18:06 Mission #13 - High Dive
2:27:25 Mission #14 - ...Blog This!
2:31:33 Mission #15 - This Ain't Checkers
2:40:35 Mission #16 - Not So Fast
2:49:48 Mission #17 - Ladies' Night
3:01:41 Mission #18 - No. 3
3:11:10 Mission #19 - Going Deep
3:22:03 Mission #20 - Caught with your Pants Down
3:34:03 Mission #21 - Dropping In
3:44:14 Mission #22 - For The Man Who Has Everything
3:53:16 Mission #23 - In The Crosshairs
4:04:11 Mission #24 - Ladies Half Price
4:13:55 Mission #25 - Party's Over
4:22:05 Final Mission #26 / Ending - Departure Time
4:40:46 End Credits

#GTA4 #TheBalladOfGayTony #RockstarGames #GTASeriesVideos

ABOUT US

GTA Series Videos is a dedicated fan-channel in no way tied to Rockstar Games or Take-Two Interactive.

Here you can find all the latest news, video walkthroughs and official trailers of the most successful video games published by Rockstar Games, including Grand Theft Auto series, Red Dead Redemption, Max Payne, L.A. Noire, Bully and many others.

ABOUT GRAND THEFT AUTO: THE BALLAD OF GAY TONY

The Ballad of Gay Tony injects Liberty City with an overdose of guns, glitz, and grime. As Luis Lopez, part-time hoodlum and full-time assistant to legendary nightclub impresario Tony Prince (a.k.a. "Gay Tony"), players will struggle with the competing loyalties of family and friends, and with the uncertainty about who is real and who is fake in a world in which everyone has a price.
